reauth_confirm.description: Reauthentication required. Please enter your updated API key.

user.description: Set up OpenAI Conversation integration by providing your OpenAI API key. Instructions to obtain an API key can be found [here]({instructions_url}).

abort.entry_not_loaded: Cannot add things while the configuration is disabled.

error.model_not_supported: This model is not supported, please select a different model
error.web_search_minimal_reasoning: Web search is currently not supported with minimal reasoning effort

data.max_tokens: Maximum tokens to return in response

data.inline_citations: Include links in web search results

data_description.code_interpreter: This tool, also known as the python tool to the model, allows it to run code to answer questions
data_description.image_model: The model to use when generating images
data_description.inline_citations: If disabled, additional prompt is added to ask the model to not include source citations
data_description.reasoning_effort: How many reasoning tokens the model should generate before creating a response to the prompt
data_description.search_context_size: High level guidance for the amount of context window space to use for the search
data_description.user_location: Refine search results based on geography
data_description.web_search: Allow the model to search the web for the latest information before generating a response

organization_verification_required.description: Your organization must be verified to use this model. Please go to {platform_settings} and select Verify Organization. If you just verified, it can take up to 15 minutes for access to propagate.
organization_verification_required.title: Organization verification required
